description: A plugin with extra settings for tasks in Toloka.
properties.layout.description: Settings for the task appearance in Toloka. [Learn more](../operations/set-plugin-toloka.md)
properties.layout.properties.kind.descri:
How to display tasks:

* `scroll` (default) — display multiple tasks on the page at the same time.
* `pager` — display only one task on the page, with a button to switch between tasks at the bottom.
properties.layout.properties.taskWidth.d: Width of the block with the task. By default, the task is displayed at full width.
properties.notifications.description: An array of notifications. Notifications are displayed at the top of the page.
